attributes.action: Stop the creation of an Only Fools and Horses prequel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British public does not need to fund or endure 90 minutes of mind numbing mediocrity that will surely ensue if Nicholas Lyndhurst stars in an Only Fools and Horses prequel, playing the father of the character he made famous in the original show.  I fell the money needed to create this monster would be better used anywhere else, or possibly even being burnt.

"Nick Lyndhurst is a comedy genius" said writer John Sullivan.  He is wrong.

Please Gordon, intervene!  Stop this project now!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
